Row.Text: v[Version] 版更新內容: 1.App 介面調整

Instruction: 1. Provide dynamic bus arrival information in Taichung, Changhua, and Nantou. 2. Provide nearby bus routes and arrival information based on stop positions. 3. Show stop positions on e-map to help you arrive easily. 4. Provide the most comprehensive function of travel plans and the best advice based on GPS information.
Data Provider: The Public Transportation Office of the Transportation Bureau of Taichung City Hall
Developer: The Public Transportation Office of the Transportation Bureau of Taichung City Hall
